ComicInfo.Summary: Cassie and Vlad go undercover as villains Sister Sacrilege and the Altar Boy to infiltrate the masked psycho underground. It's up to Cassie to figure out who's stalking the Alternatives before the super-teen sidekick massacre claims another pile of victims!
ComicInfo.Title: Super Sleepover Sidekick Slaughter! pt 2
